itemInfo.itemDesc: A necklace that gives speed and agility to the wearer.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Melted Silver Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Silver Ore.

item.name: Sapphire
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Sapphire.
